content:
I think we have reached a critical mass with the Seymour project:
https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour
May we get a channel?

Our project was first announced here:
#announce > Regular Matroid Decomposition Theorem
BTW new contributors are still welcome!

Just the usual reminder that new channels should have at least one maintainer subscribed, or a designated person who understands the Code of Conduct and undertakes to raise any relevant problems with the CoC team.

(I'm presuming that Bhavik is satisfying this requirement here. In any case I think it's good to post this reminder whenever a new channel is requested.)
Yes, that person is me for this channel!
